title: Reflexive.DVD3.Puzzle
description:
This disc includes games, which can be purchased and downloaded from http://www.reflexive.com. In every folder is attached "Cracked.exe", that is not part of the game and it is not mandatory to be used to play the game. 

All games patched with FFF?s patch are marked accordingly. FFF?s patch itself can be found in ?Patch? folder of this disc.

All games are tested and work.* 

* Due to lack of free time not all cracked versions are tested over an hour. In case any of the games does not work correctly try to use FFF&#039;s patch.

What&#039;s included?

Why the? Reflections? logo appears before the games starts?

Simply put -- to remind you to buy the game. All games patched with FFF patch does not contain the Reflections logo. It can be easily removed by patching the original .exe with FFF&#039;s patch. 
What&#039;s the difference between Reflections and FFF patched games?
At first glance - none. FFF patch arrived to us after over 50% of the games were processed and prepared. Our own patch remained the lead one. The huge volume and various copy protection techniques forced us to use FFF&#039;s patch wherever our own did not work flawlessly.
